meta.label: API configuration
meta.description: Define presets for users to call the API with specific credentials, quota and parallelization parameters

params.name: separator_authentification
params.label: Authentification
params.description: Please refer to the Google Cloud documentation: https://cloud.google.com/natural-language/docs/setup

params.name: gcp_service_account_key
params.label: GCP service account key
params.description: Service account key as JSON. If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: separator_api_quota
params.label: API quota
params.description: Throttling to stay within the quota defined by Google Cloud: https://cloud.google.com/natural-language/quotas

params.name: api_quota_period
params.label: Period
params.description: Reset period of the quota in seconds. Defined by Google Cloud.

params.name: api_quota_rate_limit
params.label: Rate limit
params.description: Maximum number of requests per period for one DSS activity. Reduce for concurrent activities.

params.name: parallel_workers
params.label: Concurrency
params.description: Number of threads calling the API in parallel (maximum 100). Increase to speed-up computation within the quota defined above.
